name: FindLegs.com
overview:
FindLegs.com is a multi-lingual social network platform that promotes action and activities amongst users by integrating multiple user-friendly online communication technologies and channels in efforts to promote thinking, cycling of information, interaction, and finally action.

The mission is to begin with improving the life of it’s members through interaction of ideas and activities. The point is to think, to cycle information, to talk about it and to take action. With this outline, the vision is to use the network to:

â€¢provide a positive, encouraging, fun and safe environment for people to gather; â€¢aid people in meeting one another based on interests and goals; â€¢ease the process of exchanging information, seeking assistance and giving help; â€¢encourage open communication, ideas sharing and giving feedback; â€¢arrange trades and meetings; â€¢facilitate collaboration in solving problems; and â€¢reaches all users around the world.
